homeBgDataList.bgDes: Situated on the top deck of Rhodes Island, a familiar view that greets you every morning on your way to work.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.

homeBgDataList.bgDes: You stroll around the top deck, the twin moons high in the sky. And so ends another normal day on Terra.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Lurking evil and tidings unseen. Stories under cloudy skies rarely have good endings.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.
unlockDesList: Clear Main Theme 9-19 with a 3-star rating

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Set aside all worries and enjoy a brief respite. To many, this is an extravagant dream.

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Welcome to the city of commerce. Struggle amidst wealth and greed as you try to gain a foothold.
